about_the_game:
Elite Exorcist Miko is a bullet hell shoot 'em up featuring Sakura Miko, the one and only elite shrine maiden of hololive! Evil spirits have possessed your fellow hololive members, causing them to wreak havoc! It's up to you to bring them back to their senses by facing them in direct combat and freeing them from the spirits' influence. Do you have what it takes to challenge and harness the powers your friends have at their disposal?

FACE THE FIRE!

Use a combination of melee, shooting, a variety of equipment and 3 distinct battle styles to fight a multitude of enemies and bosses in intense bullet hell combat!

RESCUE THEM ALL!

Find and challenge hololive members across 6 distinct stages, with more to come! No two runs will be the same; encounter different bosses, equip different items, improve your skills and test your mettle across multiple runs!

BECOME STRONGER!

Your abilities are limited on their own, but you can make use of the power of your defeated foes and friends! Use materials obtained from runs to increase your strength and craft new equipment, preparing you for greater challenges ahead!

A VARIETY OF CHALLENGES!

Take on boss battle after boss battle in Boss Rush, or endless waves of enemies in Shrine Sweep! Optional Extra Stages are also available as high difficulty trials; currently one, with more in store for the future!

WARNING: This game contains some flashing lights. Player discretion is advised.



This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)
This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".
Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.
CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.
※2. About "holo Indie"
holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.
It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.
For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

name: Elite Exorcist Miko

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: A bullet hell shoot 'em up featuring hololive’s Sakura Miko! hololive has been possessed by evil spirits! Combine melee and ranged combat with a variety of items to fight your friends and set them free!
